articles.title: Margot Robbie channels Barbie at CinemaCon with Ryan Gosling - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 32-year-old Australian actress wowed at the event with a baby pink ensemble that showed off her incredibly toned physique.
articles.content:
Margot Robbie nailed Barbie-chic on Tuesday as she promoted her hotly-anticipated new film with co-star Ryan Gosling and director Greta Gerwig at CinemaCon. 
The 32-year-old Australian actress wowed… [+5445 chars]

articles.title: Adele joins James Corden for emotional Carpool Karaoke finale - The Guardian
articles.description: Singer breaks down in tears while discussing divorce as she returns for presenter’s last episode of The Late Late Show
articles.content:
Adele broke down in tears while discussing her divorce as she joined James Corden for the final Carpool Karaoke in his last week as host of the The Late Late Show on the US network CBS.

articles.author: Emma Wilkes
articles.title: U2 announce dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live at Sphere' - NME
articles.description: U2 have announced the dates for 'Achtung Baby: Live At Sphere', their first shows for four years. They are the first band to play there.
articles.content:
U2 have confirmed the dates for a run of shows where they will play ‘Achtung Baby’ in full at the new Sphere in Las Vegas.
